MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK11 postcode area of Menstrie. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am to repair an overhead cable fault near the Victoria Terrace substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.04am on Monday 1st March 2021.
